snippet.title: The 7th Guest VR | Announce Trailer [ESRB]
snippet.description:
#vertigogames #the7thguestvr #the7thguest
The iconic mystery game, The 7th Guest, has been brought back to life with cutting-edge VR technology, that delivers an atmospheric story like no other. Explore the foreboding mansion, solve challenging puzzles, and uncover its dark secrets. The 7th Guest VR is the ultimate mystery adventure, and it's time for you to experience it for yourself.

Wishlist it now: 
- Steam: https://vrt.gg/t7g-steam
- Meta Quest: https://vrt.gg/t7g-quest

#virtualreality #vr #T7G
